verses.verse: וָאָשׁ֕וּב <S%H7725><s%> va-'a-Shuv Then I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa and lifted up עֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh; and looked וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְגִלָּ֥ה <S%H4039><s%> me-gil-Lah roll עָפָֽה׃ <S%H5774><s%> 'a-Fah. and behold a flying

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah I רֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh; unto me What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, thou;And I answered אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh I see מְגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4039><s%> me-gil-Lah roll עָפָ֔ה <S%H5774><s%> 'a-Fah, a flying אָרְכָּהּ֙ <S%H753><s%> 'a-re-Kah the length עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim thereof [is] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרָחְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7341><s%> ve-ra-che-Bah and the breadth עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser thereof ten בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah. cubits

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָֽאָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> ha-'a-Lah, he unto me This [is] the curse הַיּוֹצֵ֖את <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tzet that goeth forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei over the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the whole earth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki surely כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol everyone הַגֹּנֵ֗ב <S%H1589><s%> hag-go-Nev, for every one that stealeth מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh This כָּמ֣וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-ha [as] on this side according נִקָּ֔ה <S%H5352><s%> nik-Kah, shall be cut off וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and everyone הַנִּ֨שְׁבָּ֔ע <S%H7650><s%> han-Nish-Ba', to it and every one that sweareth מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh one כָּמ֥וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-ha [as] on that side according נִקָּֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> nik-Kah. shall be cut off

הוֹצֵאתִ֗יהָ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tze-Ti-ha, I will bring it forth נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts וּבָ֙אָה֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'ah and it shall enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house הַגַּנָּ֔ב <S%H1590><s%> hag-gan-Nav, of the thief וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and into the house הַנִּשְׁבָּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> han-nish-Ba' of him that sweareth בִּשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mi by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lash-Sha-ker; falsely וְלָ֙נֶה֙ <S%H3885><s%> ve-La-neh and it shall remain בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, of his house וְכִלַּ֖תּוּ <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-Lat-tu and shall consume וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for עֵצָ֥יו <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzav it with the timber וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for אֲבָנָֽיו׃ <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nav. thereof and the stones

וַיֵּצֵ֕א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze with me went forth הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> sa unto me Lift up נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh, and see מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what הַיּוֹצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tzet what [is] this that goeth forth הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. I

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar And I said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi; and he וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, What [is] it;And he said זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָֽאֵיפָה֙ <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah This [is] an ephah הַיּוֹצֵ֔את <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tzet, that goeth forth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer He said זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֵינָ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nam moreover This [is] their resemblance בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. through all the earth

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> kik-Kar a talent עֹפֶ֖רֶת <S%H5777><s%> 'o-Fe-ret of lead נִשֵּׂ֑את <S%H5375><s%> nis-Set; And behold there was lifted up וְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> ve-zoT is a אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, and this [is] a יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> yo-She-vet that sitteth בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah. of the ephah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָרִשְׁעָ֔ה <S%H7564><s%> ha-rish-'Ah, This [is] wickedness וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <S%H7993><s%> vai-yash-Lech And he cast אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch it into the midst הָֽאֵיפָ֑ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah; of the ephah וַיַּשְׁלֵ֛ךְ <S%H7993><s%> vai-yash-Lech and he cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven the weight הָעֹפֶ֖רֶת <S%H5777><s%> ha-'o-Fe-ret of lead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-ha. upon the mouth ס sa-Mek

וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa Then lifted I up עֵינַ֜י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֵ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re, and looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and there שְׁתַּ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim two נָשִׁ֤ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim women יֽוֹצְאוֹת֙ <S%H3318><s%> yotz-'Ot and behold there came out וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach and the wind בְּכַנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3671><s%> be-chan-fei-Hem, [was] in their wings וְלָהֵ֥נָּה <S%H2007><s%> ve-la-Hen-nah for they had כְנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> che-na-Fa-yim wings כְּכַנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> ke-chan-Fei like the wings הַחֲסִידָ֑ה <S%H2624><s%> ha-cha-si-Dah; of a stork וַתִּשֶּׂ֙אנָה֙ <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Se-nah and they lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah, the ephah בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz between the earth וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. and the heaven

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar Then said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach I to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; אָ֛נָה <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah Where הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah are they מֽוֹלִכ֖וֹת <S%H1980><s%> mo-li-Chot taking אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah. ephah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> Liv-not- unto me To build לָ֥הֿ lah בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> Va-yit it an house בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁנְעָ֑ר <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar; of Shinar וְהוּכַ֛ן <S%H3559><s%> ve-hu-Chan and it shall be established וְהֻנִּ֥יחָה <S%H3240><s%> ve-hun-Ni-chah and set שָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- her own מְכֻנָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H4369><s%> me-chu-na-Tah. there upon her own base ס sa-Mek
